mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sample_profile sp JOIN genetic_profile gp ON gp.genetic_profile_id = sp.genetic_profile_id JOIN cancer_study cs ON cs.cancer_study_id = gp.cancer_study_id WHERE cs.cancer_study_identifier = #{studyId} AND sp.panel_id IS NOT NULL )

SELECT sp.sample_id as rowKey, s.stable_id as sampleStableId, gp.stable_id as geneticProfileStableId, gpan.stable_id as genePanelStableId FROM sample_profile sp JOIN sample s ON s.internal_id = sp.sample_id JOIN gene_panel gpan ON gpan.internal_id = sp.panel_id JOIN genetic_profile gp ON gp.genetic_profile_id = sp.genetic_profile_id JOIN cancer_study cs ON cs.cancer_study_id = gp.cancer_study_id WHERE cs.cancer_study_identifier = #{studyId} ORDER BY sp.sample_id

SELECT DISTINCT gp.stable_id FROM sample_profile sp JOIN genetic_profile gp ON gp.genetic_profile_id = sp.genetic_profile_id JOIN cancer_study cs ON cs.cancer_study_id = gp.cancer_study_id WHERE cs.cancer_study_identifier = #{studyId} AND sp.panel_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gp.stable_id
